nodes.id: 中国人民银行云南省分行

zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行
中华人民共和国国家金库云南省分库
中国人民银行昆明中心支行
中国人民银行昆明中支

location.zh-cn: 云南省昆明市五华区威远街113号金融大厦

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行在云南省的分支机构。1950年3月8日成立，1969年12月因文化大革命被裁撤。1984年1月1日后恢复。1998年改革后改称中国人民银行昆明中心支行，2023年8月18日恢复中国人民银行云南省分行名称。
description.en: The Yunnan provincial branch of the People's Bank of China. Established on March 8, 1950, it was dissolved in December 1969 due to the Cultural Revolution. It was re-established after January 1, 1984. After the 1998 reform, it was renamed the Kunming Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China, and its name was restored to the Yunnan Provincial Branch of the People's Bank of China on August 18, 2023.

nodes.id: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局

zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局在云南省的分支机构，与中国人民银行云南省分行合署办公。
description.en: The Yunnan provincial branch of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, which operates jointly with the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行行长。
description.en: Governor of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 规定中国人民银行职责与结构的法律。
description.en: The law that defines the responsibilities and structure of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国云南省主席，后宣布起义。
description.en: Then Chairman of Yunnan Province of the Republic of China, who later declared an uprising.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国云南省主席卢汉通电全国，脱离中华民国政府，归附中华人民共和国中央人民政府的事件。
description.en: The event where Lu Han, then Chairman of Yunnan Province of the Republic of China, declared secession from the ROC government and allegiance to the Central People's Government of the PRC.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1949年成立的中国政府。
description.en: The government of China established in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，率部进入云南。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who led troops into Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，率部进入云南。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who led troops into Yunnan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第二野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二野战军
en: Second Field Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国第二次国共内战时期主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军滇桂黔边纵队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军滇桂黔边纵队

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在云南、广西、贵州边境地区领导的武装力量。
description.en: Armed forces led by the Communist Party of China in the border areas of Yunnan, Guangxi, and Guizhou.

nodes.id: 昆明市军事管制委员会

zh-cn: 昆明市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年由西南军区成立，负责昆明市的军事管制和政权接收工作。
description.en: Established by the Southwest Military Region in 1950, responsible for military control and the takeover of political power in Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 指1927年至1948年由中国国民党领导的中华民国政府。
description.en: Refers to the government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang from 1927 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行首任行长。
description.en: The first governor of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch.

nodes.id: 中国人民银行西南区行

zh-cn: 中国人民银行西南区行

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行在西南地区的派出机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the People's Bank of China in the Southwest region.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 云南省人民政府负责财政工作的组成部门。
description.en: The department of the Yunnan Provincial People's Government responsible for fiscal work.

description.zh-cn: 由中国人民银行云南省分行与云南省财政厅于1969年12月合并而成的机构。
description.en: An organization formed in December 1969 by the merger of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch and the Yunnan Provincial Department of Finance.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 人民银行省级机构改革实施方案

zh-cn: 人民银行省级机构改革实施方案

description.zh-cn: 1998年国务院批准的针对中国人民银行省级机构的改革方案，撤销省级分行，设立跨省区的分行。
description.en: A reform plan for the provincial branches of the People's Bank of China approved by the State Council in 1998, which abolished provincial branches and established cross-provincial branches.

nodes.id: 中国人民银行成都分行

zh-cn: 中国人民银行成都分行

description.zh-cn: 1998年改革后成立的中国人民银行跨省区分行之一，辖区包括云南省。
description.en: One of the cross-provincial branches of the People's Bank of China established after the 1998 reform, with jurisdiction including Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西南部边疆省份。
description.en: A frontier province in southwestern People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设置的的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责外汇管理的机构。
description.en: The agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign exchange administration.

description.zh-cn: 一种货币价值快速且通常是加速下跌的经济现象。
description.en: An economic phenomenon where the value of a currency falls rapidly and often at an accelerating rate.

description.zh-cn: 1958年至1960年间中华人民共和国的一场经济和社会运动。
description.en: An economic and social campaign in the People's Republic of China from 1958 to 1960.

description.zh-cn: 云南省的金融学术研究团体。
description.en: An academic research group for finance in Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 云南省的钱币研究学术团体。
description.en: A numismatic research academic group in Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性钱币学群众性学术团体。
description.en: A national popular academic group for numismatics in China.

relationships.source: 李滔
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 李滔担任中国人民银行云南省分行行长。
description.en: Li Tao serves as the Governor of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch.

relationships.source: 李滔
relationships.target: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行行长兼任国家外汇管理局云南省分局局长。
description.en: The Governor of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch also serves as the Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange Yunnan Provincial Branch.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 中国人民银行

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行是中国人民银行的分支机构。
description.en: The People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch is a branch of the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局与中国人民银行云南省分行合署办公。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange Yunnan Provincial Branch and the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch operate jointly.

relationships.source: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局
relationships.target: 国家外汇管理局

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局云南省分局是国家外汇管理局的分支机构。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange Yunnan Provincial Branch is a branch of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

relationships.source: 卢汉
relationships.target: 卢汉云南起义

description.zh-cn: 1949年12月9日，时任中华民国云南省主席卢汉通电全国，宣布“云南起义”。
description.en: On December 9, 1949, Lu Han, then Chairman of Yunnan Province of the Republic of China, telegraphed the nation to announce the 'Yunnan Uprising'.

relationships.source: 卢汉云南起义
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 卢汉宣布起义，投向新成立的中华人民共和国政府，促使中国人民解放军进军云南，巩固了新政府对该地区的控制。
description.en: Lu Han declared an uprising and sided with the newly established People's Republic of China government, prompting the People's Liberation Army to advance into Yunnan and consolidate the new government's control over the region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第二野战军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军滇桂黔边纵队

description.zh-cn: 1950年2月，陈赓、宋任穷率领的中国人民解放军第二野战军第4兵团与滇桂黔边纵队在云南省昆明市宜良县会师。
description.en: In February 1950, the 4th Army Corps of the Second Field Army of the People's Liberation Army, led by Chen Geng and Song Renqiong, rendezvoused with the Yunnan-Guangxi-Guizhou Border Column in Yiliang County, Kunming City, Yunnan Province.

relationships.source: 西南军区
relationships.target: 昆明市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月5日，西南军区成立了昆明市军事管制委员会。
description.en: On March 5, 1950, the Southwest Military Region established the Kunming Military Control Commission.

relationships.source: 昆明市军事管制委员会
relationships.target: 国民政府

description.zh-cn: 昆明市军事管制委员会下设的金融组负责接收国民政府在昆明的金融机构。
description.en: The finance group under the Kunming Military Control Commission was responsible for taking over the financial institutions of the Nationalist Government in Kunming.

relationships.source: 昆明市军事管制委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 通过其下设的金融组，昆明市军事管制委员会成立了中国人民银行云南省分行。
description.en: Through its finance group, the Kunming Military Control Commission established the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch.

relationships.source: 李铁亚
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 李铁亚于1950年3月8日出任中国人民银行云南省分行首任行长。
description.en: Li Tieya became the first governor of the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch on March 8, 1950.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 中国人民银行西南区行

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行成立后，归中国人民银行西南区行管辖。
description.en: After its establishment, the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch was under the jurisdiction of the People's Bank of China Southwest Regional Branch.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 恶性通货膨胀

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行云南省分行在建行后，完成了当地人民币市场的构建，并遏制了长期以来的恶性通货膨胀。
description.en: After its establishment, the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch completed the construction of the local RMB market and curbed the long-standing hyperinflation.

relationships.source: 大跃进
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 大跃进时期，因受左倾浮夸风影响，云南货币投放失去控制。
description.en: During the Great Leap Forward, influenced by the leftist 'exaggeration wind', monetary issuance in Yunnan went out of control.

relationships.source: 文化大革命
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 1969年12月，中国人民银行云南省分行在文化大革命期间被裁撤。
description.en: In December 1969, the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch was dissolved during the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 云南省财政金融局

description.zh-cn: 1969年12月，被裁撤的中国人民银行云南省分行与云南省财政厅合并为云南省财政金融局。
description.en: In December 1969, the dissolved People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch merged with the Yunnan Provincial Department of Finance to form the Yunnan Provincial Bureau of Finance and Banking.

relationships.source: 云南省财政厅
relationships.target: 云南省财政金融局

description.zh-cn: 1969年12月，云南省财政厅与被裁撤的中国人民银行云南省分行合并为云南省财政金融局。
description.en: In December 1969, the Yunnan Provincial Department of Finance merged with the dissolved People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch to form the Yunnan Provincial Bureau of Finance and Banking.

relationships.source: 中国国务院
relationships.target: 人民银行省级机构改革实施方案

description.zh-cn: 1998年10月，中国国务院批准了《人民银行省级机构改革实施方案》。
description.en: In October 1998, the State Council of China approved the 'Implementation Plan for the Reform of the Provincial Branches of the People's Bank of China'.

relationships.source: 人民银行省级机构改革实施方案
relationships.target: 中国人民银行云南省分行

description.zh-cn: 根据该方案，中国人民银行云南省分行被撤销，并改组为中国人民银行昆明中心支行。
description.en: According to the plan, the People's Bank of China Yunnan Provincial Branch was abolished and reorganized into the Kunming Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 中国人民银行成都分行

description.zh-cn: 1998年改革后，云南省属成都分行辖区，昆明中心支行（即原云南省分行）归其管辖。
description.en: After the 1998 reform, Yunnan Province came under the jurisdiction of the Chengdu Branch, and the Kunming Central Sub-branch (formerly the Yunnan Provincial Branch) was subordinate to it.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 云南省金融学会

description.zh-cn: 1980年，云南省人民银行成立了云南省金融学会。
description.en: In 1980, the Yunnan Provincial People's Bank established the Yunnan Provincial Finance Society.

relationships.source: 中国人民银行云南省分行
relationships.target: 云南省钱币研究会

description.zh-cn: 1983年，云南省人民银行成立了云南省钱币研究会。
description.en: In 1983, the Yunnan Provincial People's Bank established the Yunnan Provincial Numismatic Research Society.

relationships.source: 云南省钱币研究会
relationships.target: 中国钱币学会

description.zh-cn: 云南省钱币研究会成立之初为中国钱币学会团体会员。
description.en: Upon its establishment, the Yunnan Provincial Numismatic Research Society was an institutional member of the China Numismatic Society.

relationships.source: 云南省钱币研究会
relationships.target: 云南省金融学会

description.zh-cn: 云南省钱币研究会成立之初为云南省金融学会团体会员。
description.en: Upon its establishment, the Yunnan Provincial Numismatic Research Society was an institutional member of the Yunnan Provincial Finance Society.
